newsitem.title: UK: U. Utilities yr profits hit by exceptionals.
newsitem.headline: U. Utilities yr profits hit by exceptionals.

text.p: NOTE - United Utilities made an exceptional charge of 83 million stg in respect of operations in Bangkok and a loss on disposal of businesses of 77.1 million stg.
Analysts had forecast pre-tax profits before exceptionals in a range between 458 and 475 million stg.
Full company name - United Utilities Plc
